articles.description: According to reports, Yuvraj Singh's request to come out of retirement in January 2021 was turned down by the Sourav Ganguly-led BCCI for an odd reason.
articles.content: Former India cricketer Yuvraj Singh retired from all forms of cricket in June 2019, thus drawing curtains on a 20-year-long career. However, after retirement, he spent his time playing for various le… [+3298 chars]

articles.author: ESPN
articles.title: Leeds criticised for mocking pundit Karen Carney on social media - ESPN India
articles.description: Leeds have been criticised after the club's Twitter account mocked Karen Carney after she claimed they will struggle at the end of the season.
articles.content: Leeds United have been criticised after the club's official Twitter account mocked football pundit and former England international Karen Carney after she claimed they will struggle at the end of the… [+3304 chars]
